segments.text: I want to change rooms immediately , plus a refund for tonight .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry , sir . Exactly what is the problem ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm so sorry , sir . We'll give you a new room immediately , and give you a refund also .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . I'm glad that this hotel strives to keep its reputation intact .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sir , we always try to please our guests .
segments.speaker: S2
